summary: Isopropyl alcohol, also known as rubbing alcohol, is a colorless, flammable liquid with a strong smell. It can mix with many substances, like water and ethanol, and is used as a solvent in medical and household products. It's made from propene or acetone and is used in things like hand sanitizers, antiseptics, and detergents. Despite its uses, it's dangerous if swallowed or absorbed, causing serious health problems. Over a million tons of it are made worldwide every year.
title: Isopropyl alcohol
